#floor

The same logic applies to gifts
If I want to add a plush pepe to my name, I can ‚Äî even if I plan to send it to a friend.
But that doesn't necessarily mean I own it.

I‚Äôll say this upfront: I could be wrong, but I believe that at some point, a sticker section will be added to our profiles.

That said, I always encourage people to ask themselves one thing:
Why would major brands take this step if they weren‚Äôt confident about long-term growth?
And it‚Äôs not just one ‚Äî many brands have already joined in, and more keep coming.

Clearly, the plans for stickers are already much more developed than what we can currently see or imagine
